title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
### Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

**Product Name:** Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

**Product Details:**

- **Wreath Diameter:** 23.6 inches
- **Garland Length:** 8.8 feet
- **Components:** 
  - Snowflake Pine Needle Branches
  - 2 Types of Pine Cones
  - Berry Clusters
  - Frosted Branches
  - 100 LED Warm Lights

**Lighting Features:**
- **Total LED Lights:** 100
- **Power Source:** 3 AA Batteries (Not Included)
- **Timer Function:** 6 hours on, 18 hours off

**Assembly Required:** No assembly required.

**Material Quality:**
- Sturdy High-Quality Materials
- Hypoallergenic
- Fireproof Pins

**Durability:** Strong and Durable
- Maintenance-Free
- Never Fades

**Suitability:** Indoor and Outdoor
- Suitable Locations: Wall, Door, Fireplace, Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room, Windows

**Warranty Period:** 365 Days
- 24/7 Customer Service Availability

---

With its stunning design and easy-to-use features, the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set is the perfect addition to any home for the holiday season. Crafted with high-quality materials, this wreath and garland set features a variety of natural elements, including snowflake pine needle branches, different types of pine cones, and frosted branches, all beautifully adorned with 100 warm white LED lights.

The set comes complete with a 6-hour on and 18-hour off timer, powered by 3 AA batteries (batteries not included), ensuring you can enjoy your festive decor throughout the evening and night. The wreath and garland are built to withstand the test of time, with sturdy construction and fireproof pins designed to keep your home safe.

Whether you're decorating your living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows, this versatile wreath and garland set is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. The hypoallergenic materials make it ideal for allergy-sensitive homes, and the maintenance-free design ensures you can enjoy your decorations year after year without worry.

For the ultimate in customer satisfaction, this product comes with a 365-day warranty and 24/7 customer service availability, ensuring you have the support you need whenever you need it.

Transform your home this holiday season with the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set â€“ the perfect blend of beauty and functionality for any festive occasion.
